metadata.title: CVE-2017-7559 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Undertow 2.x before 2.0.0.Alpha2, 1.4.x before 1.4.17.Final, and 1.3.xbefore 1.3.31.Final, it was found that the fix for CVE-2017-2666 wasincomplete and invalid characters are still allowed in the query string andpath parameters. This could be exploited, in conjunction with a proxy thatalso permitted the invalid characters but with a different interpretation,to inject data into the HTTP response. By manipulating the HTTP responsethe attacker could poison a web-cache, perform an XSS attack, or obtainsensitive information from requests other than their own.

criterions.comment: undertow package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
